'\xc2\x7'
'An Azure Machine Learning workspace. See Create workspace resources.'
'An Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) Gen 2 storage account. See Create an Azure'
'Data Lake Storage (ADLS) Gen 2 storage account.'
'\xc2\x7 To enale this feature:'
'1. Navigate to the Azure Machine Learning studio UI'
'2. In the icon section at the top right of the screen, select Manage preview'
'features (megaphone icon)'
'3. In the Managed preview feature panel, toggle the Run noteooks and jos'
'on managed Spark feature to on'
